${ModID}:DiscardNextTurnPower.NAME: Discard Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Discard !A! card next turn.
Discard !A! cards next turn.

${ModID}:DrawNextTurnPower.NAME: Draw Next Turn
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw !A! card next turn.
Draw !A! cards next turn.

${ModID}:EnergyDownNextTurnPower.NAME: Energy Reduction
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose [E] at the start of your next turn.
Lose !A! [E] at the start of your next turn.

${ModID}:WetPower.NAME: Wet
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! more damage from [${ModID}:IceIcon] attacks.

${ModID}:BarbedPower.NAME: Barbed
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! damage whenever it attacks.

${ModID}:MetamagicPower.NAME: Metamagic
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next Exile card affects ALL enemies.

${ModID}:SummonMonsterPower.NAME: Pandamonium
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, Channel a Panda that deals !A! damage.

${ModID}:ChargePower.NAME: Charged
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !A! #yVigor next turn.

${ModID}:SiphonPower.NAME: Siphoning
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal Attack damage, gain !A! #yTemporary #yHP.

${ModID}:EnergizedExilePower.NAME: Energized
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b !A! additional [E] next turn.

${ModID}:RingingPower.NAME: Ringing
DESCRIPTIONS: Boosts damage of #yResonant cards.

${ModID}:CorrodedPower.NAME: Corroded
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! more damage from everything this turn.

${ModID}:FrostbitePower.NAME: Frostbite
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever it attacks, takes !A! damage, then reduce #yFrostbite by #b1.

${ModID}:TempNegStrengthPower.NAME: Damage Down
DESCRIPTIONS: Does !A! less damage with attacks this turn.

${ModID}:AlteredSpellsPower.NAME: Altered Spells
DESCRIPTIONS: Your attacks apply !A! #yJinx.

${ModID}:BurningPower.NAME: Burning
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! damage at the start of its turn.

${ModID}:ElegantEtchingPower.NAME: Elegant Etching
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a #ySigil, apply !A! #yJinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:AnticipatePower.NAME: Anticipate
DESCRIPTIONS: Activate to draw a card and discard a card. !A! use left.
Activate to draw a card and discard a card. !A! uses left.

${ModID}:ExploitedPower.NAME: Exploited
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes an additional !A!% more damage from Attacks when #yVulnerable.

${ModID}:CataclysmPower.NAME: Cataclysm
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play !A2! more card this turn, deal !A! damage to ALL enemies.
When you play !A2! more cards this turn, deal !A! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:JinxPower.NAME: Jinx
DESCRIPTIONS: When debuffed with another debuff, this creature will lose !A! HP.

${ModID}:ManaBurnPower.NAME: Mana Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: Cards cost 0. Lose #b1 HP whenever you play a card.

${ModID}:DimensionalPouchPower.NAME: Dimensional Pouch
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, you may spend [E] to draw !A2! cards.
!A! times per turn, you may spend [E] to draw !A2! cards.
Spend [E] to draw !A2! cards.

${ModID}:ContingencyPower.NAME: Contingency
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, you may discard a card.
!A! times per turn, you may discard a card.
Discard a card.

${ModID}:BeesPower.NAME: Bees
DESCRIPTIONS: Loses !A! HP for each debuff they have at the start of their turn.

${ModID}:ConsumeSoulsPower.NAME: Consume Souls
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a non-minion enemy dies, gain !A! Max HP.

${ModID}:StoneskinPower.NAME: Stoneskin
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would take damage this turn, take !A! less.

${ModID}:FlankedPower.NAME: Flanked
DESCRIPTIONS: Loses !A! HP when attacked.

${ModID}:DecayPower.NAME: Decay
DESCRIPTIONS: Takes !A! extra damage from non-Attacks.

${ModID}:RelentlessnessPower.NAME: Relentlessness
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you play an attack each turn, draw a card.
The first !A! times you play an attack each turn, draw a card.

${ModID}:PorcupinePower.NAME: Porcupine
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, you may spend [E] to add !A2! #yQuills into your hand.
!A! times per turn, you may spend [E] to add !A2! #yQuills into your hand.
Spend [E] to add !A2! #yQuills into your hand.

${ModID}:SpinningSigilPower.NAME: Spinning
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yJinx, apply !A! more.

${ModID}:ManaBurstPower.NAME: Mana Burst
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you discard a #ySigil each turn, gain [E].
The first !A! times you discard a #ySigil each turn, gain [E].

${ModID}:HastePower.NAME: Haste
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of each turn.
Gain !A! [E] at the start of each turn.

${ModID}:PowerGradientPower.NAME: Power Gradient
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you gain a Buff, apply !A! #yCorroded to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:AuraOfMisfortunePower.NAME: Aura of Misfortune
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, apply !A! #yJinx to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:ResolvePower.NAME: Resolve
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you would discard a status, exhaust it and draw a card.
Whenever you would discard a status, exhaust it and draw !A! cards.

${ModID}:ColdBloodedPower.NAME: Cold Blooded
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain !A! #yBlock whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy.

${ModID}:SlipperyPower.NAME: Slippery
DESCRIPTIONS: The next !A! times you would take damage, reduce it by half.

${ModID}:CurseSoulPower.NAME: Cursed Soul
DESCRIPTIONS: The first debuff this enemy receives each turn is applied twice.
The first !A! debuffs this enemy receives each turn is applied twice.
